parameters.name: openAndCloseFocusSettings
parameters.description: Configuration options for open and close focus behavior.

properties.name: initialFocusRef
properties.description: A ref to the element that should receive focus when the container is opened. If no ref is passed to `initialFocusRef`, the hook focuses the first focusable element inside of the container.

properties.name: containerRef
properties.description: A ref to the container element that contains focusable elements.

properties.name: returnFocusRef
properties.description: A ref to the element that should receive focus when the container is closed.

properties.name: preventFocusOnOpen
properties.description: If true, focus will not be set when the container is opened.
